name: Hello Motivation
author: JW McGregor

sections.description: You know you need to blog, sometimes it can be a challenge and sometimes it is hard not to focus on the long term goal This is where Hello Motivtion will help, displaying random motivational quotes on the top right hand side of your wordpress screen while you are working in your blog. This plugin is based on the Hello_Dolly plugin by Matt Mullenweg
sections.installation:
1. Download and unzip the current version of the hello_motivation plugin.
  2. Transfer the entire ‘hello_motivation’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. That’s it! You’re done.
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?

Support can be obtained by clicking on the contact form at jwmcgregor.com
sections.changelog:
0.1.5

  • Initial Release Dec 13 2012

0.1.6

  • minor modifications for better installation of plugin

short_description: A little plugin that will motivate you while your working in wordpress.
